channel.title: Shop help
channel.description:
Ok, I need to know if you edit what is in the shops in shop cfg.
If so. What does the Sell,buy and amount do ? I think item is the item ID... Help please ? ;)

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

to edit da prices go into item.cfg … theres tuts on it… its kind of hard if u dnt now wot ur doing

Read full topic

@tythus wrote:

its in
shop.cfg
and is normally in either a CFG or DATA folder

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

I just wanna know where I edit the prices of the items inside the shop.
The Sell Buy doesn’t do that.
If you told me what file to do it in, I could proboably figure it.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

[quote=“indiankid, post:4, topic:68001”]ok x0 0wn, i think you mean this but if i am wrong sorry…

what the numbers in the shop.cfg file?

here is what it is:

1)ok the first number “shop=1” is the shop number

2)second number after that which basically 1 1 or 2 2, 1 1= u can sell anything from that shop (like general shop) 2 2 = only can sell stuff which u add in the shop (like the armor shop)

3)then there will be a item id like 0670 that is the item.

4)then there will be another number after is like 10 or anynumber (this is the ammount of item.)

5)then the step 3 and 4 will be repeated to add more items to the store (remember the item ammount always has to be there after the item id or it will mess up)

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------[b]Sell[/b]----[b]Buy[/b]-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount here is the format the shops in shop.cfg will be like.

Hope That helps

Indian[/quote][quote=“x0 0wn, post:5, topic:68001”]Ok that helped thanks.
Which file would I edit the prices of the items inside the shop ?[/quote]
Check The Bold Things Off The Top Boarder Indian Kid was Kind Enough To Supply

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------[b]Sell[/b]----[b]Buy[/b]-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount
                             Your Shop Name                                                     Shop sells At  Shop Buys At Item ID

Read full topic

item.description:
@indiankid wrote:

ok x0 0wn, i think you mean this but if i am wrong sorry…

what the numbers in the shop.cfg file?

here is what it is:

1)ok the first number “shop=1” is the shop number

2)second number after that which basically 1 1 or 2 2, 1 1= u can sell anything from that shop (like general shop) 2 2 = only can sell stuff which u add in the shop (like the armor shop)

3)then there will be a item id like 0670 that is the item.

4)then there will be another number after is like 10 or anynumber (this is the ammount of item.)

5)then the step 3 and 4 will be repeated to add more items to the store (remember the item ammount always has to be there after the item id or it will mess up)

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount here is the format the shops in shop.cfg will be like.

Hope That helps

Indian
